comment.author: 85016918@N00
comment._content:
For a moment I thought this was Louise Curtiss, but it's definitely not. Oh well.

Curtiss is famous in my area (Titusville, FL) in that she was Titusville's silent movie star. She also was an actress at a small film studio in Jacksonville - the same film company that did the "Sunshine Babies" comedies of the later 1910s - I can't remember the studio's name. Jacksonville apparently had a small movie industry in the later 1910s. Hopefully Florida Memory has a photo of Miss Curtiss that they can post.

comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: Hi Decrepit Telephone. We don’t have any identified pictures of Louise Curtiss. However, we have several photographs that will be posted soon with unidentified actresses from the Vim Comedy Company. It is possible that Louise Curtiss is among them. Any help in identifying these individuals would be greatly appreciated!
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida
